suit: signifies the suit amongst clubs, diamonds, spades and hearts.
value: signifies the card number from 1 to 13.
show: signifies whether card is open or not.
draggable: signifies whether an open card can move.
debug: signifies whether an open card can move.
dx: signifies the relative position of inner card in x direction. 0 means one above the other. 100 means next to each other.
dy: signifies the relative position of inner card in y direction. 0 means one above the other. 100 means below the parent.

methods.shuffle(): set random suit and value attrs.
methods.align(dx, dy): set relative position of inner card.
methods.color(): get color of the card. This function cannot be chained with others as it returns string.
methods.log(msg): print tagged message in console. This function cannot be chained with others as it returns string.
